== IntrepidBrainstorm ==

The <nowiki>[[http://brainstorm.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu Brainstorm]]</nowiki> is a great resource for our users to submit feedback about ideas that they would like to see in an upcoming version of Ubuntu. For Intrepid we want to look at some of these ideas and plan sessions around them to discuss their feaseability for implementation. Since there are so many ideas and limited time, I have picked the top 3 ideas of each section and outlined them here.

If you are attending UDS and want to champion a specific idea from the Brainstorm, then please add it to the list below along with your name. If you are a track lead during UDS and feel that an idea should be punted or not discussed in favor of another, then remove it from the list.

'''NOTE: Only add ideas here if you are attending UDS-Intrepid and plan on leading the discussion of the idea during the sessions.'''
